articles.author: Mike  Chiari
articles.title: Rafael Nadal Out for 2023 French Open Due to Injury, Will Retire from Tennis in 2024 - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Legendary tennis star Rafael Nadal will not compete in the 2023 French Open due to a hip injury that has kept him out since the Australian Open in January.…
articles.content:
AP Photo/Francisco Ubilla
Legendary tennis star Rafael Nadal will not compete in the 2023 French Open due to a hip injury that has kept him out since the Australian Open in January.
According to CN… [+2184 chars]
